title: Junior Eurovision 2015 winning team feature in Republic Day honours
text:
Junior Eurovision 2015 winning team feature in Republic Day honours
The Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2015 winning team are among the 11 personalities honoured this morning with a Republic Day Award – the Midaja ghall-Qadi tar-Repubblika.
The Medal was awarded to Destiny Chukunyere and her accompanying team, Maria Abdilla, Roberta Debono, Matthew Mercieca and Elton Zarb.
Destiny won this year’s edition of the Junior Eurovision in Bulgaria with the song Not My Soul.
This was the second success for Malta in the Junior Eurovision Song Contest, with a record poll of 185 points.
